title: Swatches, 1937

Medium: acetate
Technique: Fancy compound cloth

Warp x Weft (E): 4.4 x 7.9 cm (1 3/4 x 3 1/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (F): 4.4 x 7.6 cm (1 3/4 in. x 3 in.)
Warp x Weft (G): 4.8 x 7.6 cm (1 7/8 in. x 3 in.)
Warp x Weft (H): 4.8 x 8.3 cm (1 7/8 x 3 1/4 in.)

description:
25  (17?) swatches in solid colors with designs in relief.  Several [-m,-n,-p] have metal threads running through the ground.
a-i) woven with vertical ribs and looping calligraphic lines. a- dark brown; b- light brown; c- maroon; d- black; e- navy blue; f- white; g- purple; h- burnt orange; i- green
j,k,) woven with vertical ribs and diagonal cross hatching marks; j- brown; k- black
m,n,p) woven "dots" with gold metallic wefts; m- brown; n- periwinkle blue; p- teal
o,q,r) plain weave with warp floats and "dots"; o- navy blue; q- black; r- white

tombstone.epitaph:
Swatches, 1937.
1937. Medium: acetate
Technique: Fancy compound cloth. Gift of Edith Wetmore. 1937-74-12-a/k,m/z.
